name: Coffee With a Dash of Spies
name_original: Coffee With a Dash of Spies
description:
This is a game made for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" Game Jam.

Description:

There's competition between two cafés in this world, and it's up to you to choose who to fight for.  You're a spy from the Weasel Café, that needs to capture a  recipe from a competing café, the Duck Café.  Included in this game are multiple endings, long and short,  bad and good, and it's up to you to choose which one to believe in.

Go through all of the paths, find all of the endings to understand what is really going on.....

Game Length: Approx 20-30 minutes or shorter. (I think)

There's my attempt at a description. This is my first game jam, so I really worked hard on this.

I worked on the game art and story, while my partner in crime playtested and edited out as many mistakes as possible.

Please enjoy the game!

Note: I didn't have enough time for audio... so there's one loop. (Mute it if you need to) Also transitions may be wonky.

I wish I could have added more ducks. :P
